This two piece set is very versatile. It can be dressed up or worn casually. I wore it with sandals with a heel, flat sandals and sneakers. Very cute and comfy. This set is great for traveling and the material is thick and durable, it is perfect for spring, summer and fall.

I want to like this two- piece but I can’t. It’s not for me. I’m 5’4 185 hourglass shaped and I bought an XL for length because my hips and butt take up length in loose pants. I have long legs for my height so I always notice the inseam. The pants say at my waist fine and came below my ankle but the inseam began mid inner thigh, ew. The material is ribbed slinky type so it’s heavier weighted but it gives a very cheap overall look. The top’s seams on the shoulders seemed pointy and side ruching looks cheap overall. A better quality material like Jersey, Pima cotton, or even sweatshirt athletic type would elevate the look. Slinky material show every imperfection and panty line. Very much not a keeper

It feel comfortable but the paints waist elastic is too tight for my liking. Needs more give to be comfy to me. The quality is good. But,I personally wouldn't buy again. Cost too much for what I got.

I almost reordered and sent this one  back. But I pre wash my items anyway. So that’s what I did.

评论详情: I bought this for traveling to Europe. It's so comfy on the plane and it looks really cute too. I got lots of compliments.  I'm 138 36 D and 5'8. I normally wear a small, but I'm wide in the hips so I went with a medium. It fit great and the top wasn't skin tight, but was still fitted. The pants were the perfect length on me. I wore them with a different top on the flight home. The material is ribbed and thick enough to hide flaws.
Loved the pants and fit. Shirt was tight and I hate that it’s so close on my neck (it’s a sensory issue for me). I may cut a V in it and try again. Regardless pants are worth it

I love how it looks on me despite my weight. I got a lot of compliments 😌.  I ordered two more the sage and green to mix and match them. Also, not pictured are my boots with a heel. The pants are on the long side for this funsize woman. So pair them with a heel!

评论概述: amazing material, sizing not so sure
评论详情: 5'5" 130# 34DD ordered M -- Pobably 3 1/2 stars. The 2 piece soft stretchy fabric is so comfortable and not wrinkle prone,  The royal blue color is that "greek blue" that is my favorite.  When I opened the shrink wrap clear package, i thought I had received the wrong order,  The long sleeved top - slightly cropped seemed to look like xxs size 00 with skinny arms and neck.  It is super stretchy but arms and neck are tight on me.  The bottoms looked like a full load of laundry about 30" wide at the hip and all down through the legs.  The much smaller waist band is wide and comfortable.  The length does drag on the ground in flip flops & sneakers.I assume the fit is for a much more full booty with smaller waist & torso than my square thinner shape.  I am keeping it because I love the feel & color for a great lounge outfit & and maybe short errand run, but all day out, I probably would look like I had on ill=fitting sloppy bottoms.  But some women like that look. I'm in Florida, so it will be a much cooler weather outfit

I was looking for a set that would be great for lounging around the house and for running errands, something quick and easy to slip on. This outfit checks all the boxes. Best of all, the knit is not too clingy, so you don't have to worry about any lumps or bumps showing.

I've started working in a more casual office setting, so I've been slowly introducing more comfortable but polished looking pieces into my wardrobe. I'm 5'2", 160 lbs, and have that delightful mom pooch, so I'm super picky about pants and how they camouflage that. The pants were loose enough throughout the lower tummy area and the material heavy enough to drape nicely without being clingy, but also high waisted enough to give me a really defined waistline. The top, at the size I purchased, is too wide in the shoulders, so that will likely be just a layer in colder weather for me. The pants are a little too long to wear with sandals or flat, but are good with a little bit of a platform sneaker. So far I've paired the pants with a cropped tank and jean jacket for a casual look, but I'm going to style them with a shirt and jersey blazer for days in the office. I'd definitely buy these again.
Perfect size, I ordered my exact size and this lodge outfit is perfect. I get so many comments about how comfy and cute the outfit is. Great value.

Bought these in 4 colors! Soft, comfy, stretchy, great for outing (dressy or casual) and staying home. True to size. L - 5'6 165lbs curvy 29 waist 40 hips. Could have sized down to M for a fitter look and still have room and length. Perfect for fall and early winter too. Top is crop and fitted but with large pants waist is high so shirt doesn't reveal much. Recommend.

Extremely cute, but I'm heavier up top so the Medium top does not fit and has little stretch. The Medium pants fit perfectly with a little comfy room since it's stretchy. So appears I will have to return it. I think the Large will be too big in the pants so won't reorder.
